title: Idea for champ: Neon
body:
Hey!

I don't do this often so dont be too harsh:

Think of a guy who has swords implanted in his elbows and his attack damage (base) is 60.
He uses 0 ap, he's a tank also, (so fighter, tank, for newbies he belongs in top lane)
He's like Shyvana, ish... Kinda like no mana, but must have full rage to do ult (@ lvl 6 of course)

His abilities:

Passive = Insight: If 2 enemy champs (or more) come to attack Neon He gains 10+ movement speed for each 2nd champion (Plus 0.5 each time for lvling up). 
Q = Sharp Blade: Extra damage, can stack 5 times:
Ability levelled up once: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 + damage
twice: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35
Third: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40
fourth: 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45
Fifth: 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50
W = (Cant think of one sadly) 
E = Cheap Shot: A swift punch to the balls / private area: 
Ability lvled up once: knocking out for 0.5 seconds 
2nd: 1 second
3rd: 1.5 seconds
4th: 2 seconds
5th 2.5 seconds
R = The Rage Blade: Grabs both swords out of elbows thus creating a double wheilded  (cant spell) sword
Lasts for:
1st = 5 seconds
2nd = 10 seconds
3rd = 15 seconds

Thanks if you actually read this!!

MastersYiAndMe
Note: I know he sound broken, came up with this in 5 minutes

replies.body:
So basically a good version of nocturne

Arm blades - noc has them
Sharp blades - very similar to noc's umbra blades passive just more OP since this an ability his is a passive

Here's a tip (and a spear behind it) don't rush these things, they take time to prepare if you've seen me around im usually taking and hour or more to design them as best as they can be then they end up only slighlty broken so think about what you do 5 minutes is too short to make a champ riot take sometimes months

Good try though

Neon the Battle Master


Passive: 
For each additional nearby enemy champion within 500 range that can be seen Neon gains 5 movement speed max of 25

Q Sharpened Sword
Passive: Each time Neon Attacks a target within 5 seconds he gains a stack of Sharpened Mind dealing 10 additional magic damage per stack upto a max of 5 stacks.  

Active: Q is an Auto Attack reset deals 10/20/30/40/50 + 30ish% of bonus ad deals 50 bonus damage per stack of sharpened mind(removes all stacks of Sharpened Mind Neon can not gain stacks again for 15/13/12/10/8 seconds.) (CD 12/10/8/6/4)

W Increased Moral
Neon and allies gains 6/7/8/9/10% movement speed for 6/7/8/9/10 seconds and gain 6/7/8/9/10% bonus attack damage. (CD 30/28/26/24/22)(Granted to allies within a 500 range radius)

E Battle Lust
Neon dashes to opponent and deals(20/30/40/50/60 + 10% of opponents current health)as bonus damage and stuns opponents for 1.5 seconds.  (Range 200. Increases to 300 while Ult is active)

R Battle Craving
Neon increases the power to his sword turning it into a long sword increasing his Range, Attack and Defenses for 10/15/20 Seconds. (Range increases to 300)(Attack increases by 15/30/45)(Defenses increase 30/45/60 or 30/40/50)


Haven't worked out the Base hp regen speed etc but yeah this is probably a better version of him and he no longer is a nocturne copy.

Ult may be a bit strong but yeah I think its nice.

Also he will probably need mana added bit strong without it.

Replace Q and E.

Usually passive abilities are on E.
